name: Games jigsaw puzzles
description:
Game Puzzle

A family game for everyone who loves games for the mind. Here you will find:
• puzzle car
• ship
• a boat
• a train
• Coffee
• nature puzzle
• puzzle architecture
• aircraft.

You can choose the difficulty level that you like:
• 4 pieces puzzles
• 6 pieces puzzles
• 20 pieces puzzles

An intellectual puzzle game, an interesting entertainment for your leisure.
